'''1.95''' was an update for [[PlayStation 4 Edition]] released on September 9, 2019, which fixed bugs.<ref>{{tweet|4JStudios|1170989873664339968|A bug fix patch for Minecraft: PlayStation 4 Edition is rolling out now across all regions Fix list is here|September 9, 2019}}</ref>

==Changes==
===Blocks === 
'''[[Wood]]'''
*Can now be used to craft [[planks]] ({{bug|MCCE-10011}}).
'''[[Redstone]]'''
*Can now be placed on glass ({{bug|MCCE-10012}}).

== Fixes==
'''5 issues fixed'''
*Fix for crash when pushing a button into the top of a door.
*Fix for a crash when navigating the fireworks crafting menu.
*Fixed stone mason having wrong price for chiseled bricks ({{bug|MCCE-9978}}).
*Fixed rail blocks not dropping when the block below them is destroyed ({{bug|MCCE-9653}}).
*Fix for stone masons wanting glazed terracotta instead of offering it.
